channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jim Beam to close one of its distilleries for a year
item.description: Jim Beam is reportedly pausing production at its Clermont facility for the duration of 2026 for upgrades while shifting operations to Boston, Kentucky...

item.title: Google Cloud chief reveals the long game: a decade of silicon and the energy battle behind the AI boom
item.description: "We've worked on TPUs since 2014 ... a long time before AI was fashionable," Thomas Kurian said at the Fortune Brainstorm AI conference.

item.title: Why restricting graduate loans will bankrupt America’s talent supply chain
item.description: The K-shaped divide is no longer confined to the labor market. It’s now embedded in its foundation: education.

item.title: 6 ‘unhinged’ things Spanx founder Sara Blakely did that ultimately shaped the success of her $1.2 billion empire
item.description: Blakely became the first self-made female billionaire in 2012.

item.title: ‘Five Nights At Freddy’s 2’ Is Now Streaming Just 18 Days After Release

item.title: Mortgage rates slip, sticking near 2025 lows

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
